problem_text_cn: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线a、b与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,AB=4,BC=6,DE=3,则EF的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines a, b and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, DE = N_2, then EF Long is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例的性质,掌握平行线分线段可得对应线段成比例是解题的关键．
